item.title: 2nd Edition of CMS Report
item.description: This week we announce the updated, Spring 2002 edition of The CMS Report. The report updates the product surveys from last year, and adds several new vendors to the mix, including CommonSpot, eGrail, and Ingeniux. A special bonus appendix details the role of XML in WCM, and offers a checklist for reviewing the XML capabilities of any vendor. You can buy the report online from our secure store...
